name: What Are Rocks and Mountains to Men and Women?
name_original: What Are Rocks and Mountains to Men and Women?
description:
You are Lizzy Bennet and you have just entered the Netherfield ball.  See what suitors seek your attention!

Or Pride and Prejudice but everyone is in love with Lizzy <3

Most of the text is taken from the book, but it is rearranged in different contexts for new fun and new romances!
